siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz | Full-Stack Developer | AI & Observability Enthusiast
siteMetadata.description: Ex-Elastic Engineer | AI & Observability Consultant | Open Source Enthusiast
siteMetadata.about:
I am a seasoned software engineer and team lead with extensive experience in full-stack development, performance optimization, and leading technical teams. Iâ€™ve worked with technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js and Python, across industries such as ad-tech, finance, and big data.

My expertise includes LLM powered applications, analytics, and observability. Some recent notable achievements include winning the Webby Award for the LLM game "Human or Not" and the Google AI Hackathon for "Tube Uni," along with several contributions to open-source projects like ncnn WebAssembly YOLOV5.

I am currently seeking consulting or freelance opportunities, as well as part-time roles where I can leverage my skills in software development and team leadership. Outside of work, I find balance through woodworking, travel and baking.

projects.name: Human or Not (AI21)
projects.description: **Webby Award Winner!** A Social Turing Game. Chat with someone for two minutes, and try to figure out if it was a fellow human or an AI bot. Think you can tell the difference?

projects.name: Tube Uni
projects.description: **Google AI Hackathon Winner!** An AI-powered application that generates custom podcasts on any topic, using Gemini 1.5 Pro.

projects.name: Goods.io - Elasticsearch integration and analytics
projects.description: Goods.io is a company that provites a single platform for order fullfulment and inventory management. I helped the team develop an analytics strategy, integrate Elasticsearch into their platform, and develop dashboards for their customers.

projects.name: Outburn LTD Automation and OpenSource infrastructure
projects.description: Outburn LTD is a company that provides a FHIR based API for healthcare providers. I helped Outburn ready their codebase for open source contributions, including an automation pipeline using GitHub Actions, proper usage of TypeScript and linting and contribution documentation.

projects.name: ncnn WebAssembly YOLOV5
projects.description: Contibution to the OpenSource project that allows running YOLOV5 inference directly in the browser.

projects.name: Custom Kibana Theme Plugin
projects.description: Open Source implementation for a long requested plugin for Kibana allowing customers to Customize Kibana's appearance (logos, icons, texts and more)

projects.name: Docker Elastic Observability
projects.description: Docker compose setup of an observability use case. Reporting metrics and traces from a nodejs app to Elasticsearch using APM Server using APM RUM and APM Node.js agents.

projects.name: DjangoGirls Conference Organizer
projects.description: Organized 2 DjangoGirls conferences in the RedHat offices in Raanana

experience.name: Independent Consultant & Developer
experience.description:
Consultant & Full-Stack Developer, January 2023 - Present
Worked with several customers including AI21, mygoods.io, Outburn LTD and more. I helped them with their software development, architecture, and performance optimization. I also contributed to several open-source projects.

experience.name: Elastic
experience.description:
Principal Full-Stack Developer, Performance Area Lead, January 2019 - December 2022
Worked on the Kibana architecture & services team, focused on delivering common services and React components to platform and solution teams. My contributions to Kibana, Kibana Load Testing, Kibana Capacity Test and more were made in private repositories. I was also the Performance Area Lead for Kibana, responsible for the performance of the Kibana platform.

experience.name: ironSource (Unity)
experience.description:
Full-Stack Developer, Team Lead, May 2013 - April 2018
Developed the MobileCore SDK, a cross-platform SDK for mobile developers to monetize their apps. I was responsible for the SDK's architecture, design, and implementation. I then led a team of developers and QA engineers, to develop a mobile video advertising solution, supporting cutting edge ad formats, advertising standards and targeting options. A lot of my work was focused on ad serving business logic, which led to optimizations, cutting upto 70% of data and traffic costs.

experience.name: Platonix Joint Ventures
experience.description:
Full-Stack Developer, 2008 - 2013
Worked as a fulltime freelance developer for a private equity firm. I was involved in multiple projects of different scales and complexities, using a variety of programming languages and environments, per customer requirements. Worked directly with customers from multiple industries, including finance, healthcare, and entertainment.

experience.name: AISeek
experience.description:
Embedded C \ C++ Developer, 2006 - 2008
AISeek developed an hardware that could accelerate the execution of A* algorithms on hardware, hence allowing to improve NPC AI in games. I was involved in the development of the hardware's firmware, and the software that interfaced with it. I also developed a custom C++ library for the hardware's API.

skills.name: Languages & Frameworks
skills.description: JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript,  Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, Matter.js, Highcharts, Python, Django, Android

skills.name: Other
skills.description: Docker, Google Cloud Services (gcp), Vertex AI, Roboflow, Webpack, ESLINT, Vercel, CI / CD, Github Actions, Jenkins, API design, Agile / Scrum
